questions.title: Instructions
questions.text:
We are interested in studying how users become proficient/experts at using computer applications. Specifically, we are interested in:

  1. How users learn to do the same tasks in better/faster ways
    • Eg: Learning the keyboard shortcut to save a document, rather than going through the menus to select 'save', is learning a faster way of accomplishing the same task.
  2. How users learn about new functions they previously didn't know the application could do
    • Eg: Discovering that Microsoft Word allows users to add custom words to the spellcheck dictionary, so that they aren't underlined red, is learning new functionality.

You will now complete two questionnaires about these two different types of learning.
